mapper.select: select a.cartIdx, a.cartLectureIdx, b.lectureTitle, b.lectureTeacherId, b.lectureAmount from tbl_cart a inner join tbl_lecture b on a.cartLectureIdx = b.lectureIdx where cartMemberId = #{memberId} order by cartIdx asc
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_cart where cartMemberId = #{param1} and cartLectureIdx = #{param2}
